name: Extreme Cargo Truck Climb
description:
Drive the truck on the curvy offrads and mountain try to drive carefully and become master truck driver. Drive carefully in rugged terrain because driving a big trailer on treacherous roads and dangerous turns is not an easy job. You will be careful on and follow the game map and delivered the cargo safely on required destination.

FEATURES:
- Different realistic cargo trucks and wheeler to drive
- Arrows, steering wheel and accelerator controls
- Different camera positions, cockpit camera included
-Best truck parking game like army military truck parking and driving
